display_long_description:
**You are living in a simulation!** Go back to space!

With severe memory loss, you'll arrive at your next destination: Planet Exoris. You must uncover who you really are, why you are in space and the true purpose behind the recon mission. 

**Put the headset on and simply follow your instincts. You've done this before.**

[media]

This Demo is a 25-minute journey of the first chapter in a reality blending story of resilience, sacrifice, and connection, inspired by mental health challenges and dreams of alternate realities.

It requires a 2.5m x 2.5m free floor area, hand tracking and a relaxed environment to fully immerse yourself in its music and visuals.

**The less you know, the more it becomes real. Stop reading. Space awaits.**

[media]

**Developer’s Note:**

What started as an escape from my unhelpful thoughts, transformed into a cosmic adventure that fuelled my life with motivation. From building mixed reality effects to recording music and sounds, every challenge kept me going. I feel deeply grateful for my family, friends, and this beautiful Earth.

I have an exciting mind-bending tale ahead, filled with planets, asteroids, music, alternate realities, and no gravity. If you enjoy this first chapter, **please rate and share it**. As a solo dev, your support truly keeps it going.

To report a problem: **https://wave-engines.com/tech-support**

To chat or help build the rest of the experience, **join the Discord**: discord.gg/5utvtRBzFZ or get in touch at mauro.waveengines@gmail.com

Thank you!
Mauro
